column2: Loyalty to the Party is respected by Marxians. Like Prestige, it is added to your score upon the death of a ruler.
Monthly Loyalty, which is added to your score upon the death of a ruler.

Since the Event, precious little of the knowledge written down by the scholars of the Old World has been preserved. Of what is known, few ancient scholars are as derided as the sage Marx, whose writings inspired many of old America's enemies. Nevertheless, a handful of brave (or foolhardy) adherents venerate Marx's surviving texts.
Organize a meeting to speak to the people directly about revolution and injustice.
Call on my loyalty to the Party to recruit local peasants to build the mass movement.
It is the goal of every true Marxian to bring the Party to Earth. I am no different.
Form the United Socialist States of America
Under my leadership, the words of the sage Marx have started to gain traction. If I can seize a realm of the Old World, the Marxian faith will finally have a bastion of its own.
The sage Marx tells us of the great wheel of the Dialectic that crushes oppression and ends in utopia. I will be the instrument of History that turns this wheel.

The enemies of the prophet Marx have driven the devotees of the great Historical Dialectic underground. For now, they sing paeans to false gods and identify each other with esoteric signs to meet in secret. Whether the ruling classes acknowledge it or not, the revolution cannot be stopped!
The §YMarxian§! pilgrims that flock to the holy site in §Y[Root.Location.GetName]§! impress me with the depth and passion of their faith. I am tempted to convert in secrecy...
In secret, Marxian faithfuls have organized themselves as a community in this province. From there it converts others, grows, and protects their own.
The High Commissar, leading the international effort of bringing more people into the fold.

Many of the post-Event faiths speak in hushed tones about Communists and their prophet Marx, castigated as one of America's ancient enemies. However, a handful of coastal scholars continue to find inspiration in a few of Marx's surviving texts, namely the Manifesto. Out of those pages they have decoded a mystical call to revolution against tyranny and the foundation of a universal egalitarian community, formally referred to as the Cult of Marx.

With so much lost since the Event, most of the sage Marx's writings are virtually unintelligible to the few who take them seriously. What is agreed upon is the importance of the Party, an emancipated community of believers that seeks to banish the tyrants and superstitions rulers use to hold their people in thrall. Thanks to your efforts, the Party has been called to Earth.
The United Socialist States of America

The Cult of Marx is no longer a fringe movement patronized by esoteric scholars and disgruntled peasants. The ruling classes should tremble now that the Marxian faith has a true power to represent it, a power you firmly control.
We have nothing to lose now but our chains!

From fleeing the reactionaries who would deny the great Dialectic of History to becoming a power that spans the continent, the Marxian faith has overcome all obstacles and reunited the major sites of revolutionary power. Where the disciples of Marx no doubt failed before the Event, we have suceeded, and the prospect of utopia has never been closer. Today, we proclaim the Fifth International of the Party and invite all to join in the new freedom.

It seems that some of your recruits among the peasantry have been somewhat overzealous in their roles as revolutionaries, and now you are recieving complaints of theft, blackmail and intimidation from local nobles.
Perhaps they have gone too far...
Your recent actions have impressed your fellow Marxians, but they may also have drawn the attention of old enemies. You have noticed Men in Black trailing you.
They are right to fear me
